name: Memo Word Search
description:
Memo Word Search is a small game to practice short-term memory through word search. A little game in which words appear and disappear after a few seconds to find them in a word search after all the words disappear.

Lately, memory or mobility are questions that I have to keep in mind and try to train them more frequently. I was testing an asset I bought from the Unity Asset Store. After I had tested it and played a little with it, I had an idea. The idea of adding some scripts and elements to create a little game to exercise short-term or retentive memory.

* Asset used as base for the wordsearch minigame
